step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Understanding your “Resilience Response\" score (Pillars #1-9)
step_of_the_day.content:
"The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well." John D. Rockefeller Jr.Many years ago, Herbert Benson popularized the notion of a “relaxation response\". This was essentially
            about going into a parasympathetic or recovery mode that is experienced as a sense of relaxation. A typical
            relaxation or visualization exercise helps a person engage in this response.Today I’m introducing the concept of a “Resilience Response\" which focuses on the fact that there is always
            an optimal response – moment by moment – in your life that results in or maintains your greatest resilience.
            This response occurs when you are able to be present and aware, without the baggage of negative or
            judgmental thoughts, fear, or unconscious emotional unfinished business. This response balances the numerous
            variables that go into being present and being in a place of harmony, while making the best choices to
            maximize getting your needs met. This Resilience Response score begins with your assessment along my nine
            pillars of resilience and success.

action_step:
Review what the nine pillars of resilience and success are and give yourself a total score of Resilience,
            based on how you feel you are developing along the nine dimensions.
